name: Fitness Club Wendy
description:
When the last fitness club closed in the city, Wendy was very upset. After all, now residents will not be able to train and maintain good physical shape. And then she recalls that her uncle is a well-known athlete and coach in the past. She turned to him for help, and he gladly agreed to help Wendy. Uncle called his friend, the owner of the shopping center, and found out that this center has an empty room where you can place a fitness club. Wendy happily took up this matter.

The game "Fitness Club Wendy" is made in the form of a simulator of a health center. Various clients come to you who want to keep fit. These are athletes, dancers, and businessmen. The visit consists of several stages: warm-up, treadmill, water procedures, massage. Clients choose what they currently need, and you must promptly provide them with the services of your club. The faster and better you serve them, the greater tip they will leave. With the proceeds, you can buy and improve equipment, as well as hire workers.

An exciting game "Fitness Club Wendy" will help you escape from everyday worries. In the full version of this fitness club simulator, interesting tasks, as well as funny mini-games between stages, which all players will surely enjoy, both adults and experienced, as well as the youngest beginner players.
